Question: Kbd Pack Pulp Mould Products Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KBD Pulp Mould Products Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Specializes in paper pulp packaging, pulp tray, pulp pallet, pulp mold, and pulp molding machinery
- Three locations in Dongguan, Foshan, and Suzhou
- Focuses on environmental protection and green packaging
- ISO9001 / ISO14000 / ISO18000 / FSC certified
- Products also certified by SGS, rohs, reach, and FSC
- Offers products with draft angle ≤ 1.5 ° and chamfer ≤ R1.5
- High-quality supplier for well-known enterprises such as Sony, Panasonic, Flextronics, Huawei, Epson, Philips, HP, Chanel, Dyson, and Li Ning
- Established in 1994
